name: Gokulraj Ramdass
aboutme: Over 10+ years of progressive experience in various roles involving application development and applications Build + RUN management on OnPremise and OnDemand technologies. Started as a support consultant and progressed to an Analyst and then to Consultant, Solution Architect and acting as a liaison between business, development and test teams and leading projects through successful implementation. Possess outstanding analytical and communication skills. Possess excellent presentation and very strong technical skills. Go-getter and a very quick learner delivering fast and high quality reliable results. Experiences with firms in the sales domain have built a strong business background, which coupled with my technology foundation help effectively understand the business and bridge the gap between business and technology.

items.text: Designed and developed Product Recommendations for Account Executives based on past history with ML algorithms.
Designed and developed NLP( Natural Language Processing) Parser for Intent and Entity Classification.
Architecture Design and developed ChatBOT single handedly under code name SEDA( Sales Expert Digital Assistant) integrated with SLACK to showcase DEALMotion in Mobile.
Developed ChatBOT called 'Harmony Assistant' under CoPilot for the SALES Executives esp. AEs.
Designed and developed Generic Push Notification as a Service (NaaS).

items.text: Enabled HANA based reporting solutions to provide business with data on the go.

24 hour application built Hybris Yaas with Ui5 for HackFest.

As a order2cash process expert, my responsibility was to integrate the Travel on Demand with processes without affecting the existing ERP Invoice solution to its customer.Since the internal business also affects many other internal processes like Invoice layout / eBilling / Idocs, the solution was designed to adapt them all but it was a real challenge.SAP has its flexible billing policy for customers and some countries, adapting them was also challenge to keeping the existing process in sync.
Performed deep dive analysis in ERP billing to do the draft design for the integration of TEAR to ERP.
Successfully done the global roll out of Travel on Demand across 30+ countries.
Acted as AGSâ€™s single point of contact + Subject Matter Expert in this area within SAP.
Supporting Level 2 and SME level support SAP IT internal Sales Process Issues.
Enabled almost many company codes / sales org / sales process setup in SAP SD for MA.
Defined Profile / Roles for SALES Process.
Developed REPORTs to automate the SALES process. Example.. enabling SD setup + Invoice setup.

Quality Administrator using SOLMAN.
Business Process Document Manager.
